mapper.update: UPDATE GENERAL_TBL SET G_WRITER_EMAIL = #{gWriterEmail}, G_TITLE = #{gTitle}, G_CONTENT = #{gContent}, G_VIEW = #{gView}, G_LIKE = #{gLike} WHERE G_NO = #{gNo}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GENERAL_TBL WHERE G_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchQuery} || '%'

SELECT g.*, u.U_NICKNAME AS gNickname, u.U_STAR AS gStar FROM GENERAL_TBL g JOIN USER_TBL u ON g.G_WRITER_EMAIL = u.U_EMAIL WHERE 1 = 1
AND g.G_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{params.searchQuery} || '%'
ORDER BY g.G_CREATED_DATE DESC
ORDER BY g.G_VIEW DESC
ORDER BY g.G_LIKE DESC
ORDER BY g.G_NO DESC
